name: Amish Retribution
description:
Your horse and cart have broken down but it looks like you’re in the wrong neighbourhood fool! You’re stranded in a technologically advanced city, this literally is your worst nightmare! You must destroy all technology you come across in order to keep yourself safe and less tempted to turn to the “Dark Side”

CONTROLS

The controls for this game are very simple 

W = Move up

S = Move Down

D = Move Right

A = Move Left

Left Mouse click = fire weapon

Move Mouse = Aim the character in the direction you wish to walk or fire

FEATURES

  • Enemies that are able to track you as you move
  • Enemy Death System
  • Assets that can be used as obstacles  (e.g. to hide from enemies) 

PLATFORM

Windows ONLY
